participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, Alex enjoys engaging in deep conversations and exploring new ideas, particularly in the realm of science and literature.
participant_1.background: i do not care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Resilient and hopeful, Amina is passionate about storytelling and uses her experiences to inspire others, often reflecting on her journey and the importance of freedom.
participant_2.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was 18.
